question: The question for today please, Ni, is could you describe a place in your city that you enjoy visiting?
transcript: Thank you. Okay Ni, thank you so much. That is the end of the one minute.

question: However, if I had to pick one, it would be the up-to-date shopping center, Giga Mon.
transcript: It is located on Phan Vang Dom Street in Ho Chi Minh City, about 15 minutes from my house. There are many activities. There are a variety of activities I could do there. Firstly, I usually try some mouth-battering cuisine at high-quality restaurants. and I highly recommend Caesarea, an Italian restaurant, and the food there is really delicious. And secondly, me and my friends always, always take photos together when we get there. especially photo booth, a Korean style photography model, which is really trendy among young people. I can remember vividly that last year me and my best friend went to Gigamon to celebrate her birthday. at that time I gave her a ceramic cup as a gift and she is really loved it. Mmm, and definitely I really, I really appreciated that moment. and then we took some photos together to give some unforgettable memories. The reasons why I love that place, not only because it is delicious food, but also it has sentimental value from, to me. As it witnessed all my moments and memories with my family and friends who I love the most in the world. In the future I will definitely go visit visit that place again and again Thank you so much That was I really enjoyed that I not been there but I try to go there in the future Thank you so much Ni I just take that back

question: Could you tell me please, why do so many people prefer living in cities nowadays?
transcript: Generally speaking, as I have mentioned above, there are many job opportunities to work in prestigious companies, which give them a financial freedom. For example, in Ho Chi Minh City, there are lots of big international cities, companies like, Samsung or LG, which need, which need a huge number of employees and offer them a high salary. Moreover, people can find some services like hospitals or schools easily, which is really necessary for their basic needs.

ielts_descriptor_alignment.grammar_text: The majority of sentences are error free.
ielts_descriptor_alignment.vocabulary_text: Uses less common and idiomatic vocabulary skilfully.

question: Tell me, do people have enough free time today compared to in the past?
transcript: From my point of view, I think there is less time for them to relax than in the past. As people now have much, have a huge number of assignments they have to do in their work or their study. for example, in, in the, in Vietnam in the past, students used to have full three months of summer holidays, but now they only have around two and a half months. Even they need to, they need to participate in some extra classes like a math or English class. So, however, some people said that in the past they needed to do part-time job in the free time to help their family. So it is not the time when they enjoy or for them to relax themselves. Interesting Very interesting isn it How can technology influence the way that people spend their time In my opinion in my opinion people spend much more time on their phones during their free time which makes them a little bit isolated For example, in the past, children, usually gather together to play, to do outdoor activities like playing high and sick or playing football. but now you hardly ever see, you hardly ever see anywhere. however, some people make friends, some people make friends through the social media and then they, they, they say their story with the people that have the same hobbies with them and it makes them more relaxed and comfortable. Thank you so much. Well done. And now please, the final question for today.

anti_overrating.reason: 'high and sick' (hide and seek). 'do part-time job' (do part-time jobs / work part-time). 'say their story' (share their story).

And not, and avoid becoming a passive people. for instance, now children spend more than eight hours a day playing game, playing online games, and do not talk to, and do not talk to other people. And it, it have, it badly impacts on their future. Definitely. but, so, however, there is a high crime rate, such as kidnapping children for ransom. I mean, I mean, criminals will kidnap the children and then require their parents for a huge sum of money. And, and after they receive money, they will Give back their children. Wow. So some, some parents really worried about that so sometimes they discourage their children to spend a lot of time outside. Amazing. Thank you very much. And Lee, that brings us to the end of the test. Thank you very much. Well done. Well done. I am so proud of you. Fantastic. Fantastic.
